files.help:
Currently tldr-pages do not have any specification for clients on where to cache tldr-pages. See the relevant [issue](https://github.com/tldr-pages/tldr/issues/876) and [specification](https://github.com/tldr-pages/tldr/blob/main/CLIENT-SPECIFICATION.md)

Official tldr-nodejs-client, tldr-python-client or tldr-c-client do not support XDG Base Directories.

**Use [Tealdeer](https://github.com/dbrgn/tealdeer), a rust client for tldr that supports XDG Base Directories instead.**
